issue.title: [Rust] Expand testing of kernels to other numeric types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The testing of compute kernels we normally use a simple example that is specific to a particular numeric type.  We should write a generic helper function and expand testing to all numeric types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6409?focusedCommentId=16931351) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~paddyhoran]` may we postpone it after 0.15?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6409?focusedCommentId=17332033) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/49
